title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: The bug report is missing a description.
OB:
Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, I performed the following steps:
1. Created a new file called f1.txt.
2. Selected 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
3. Nothing happened.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
4. Observe that nothing happens.
